summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, dated August 4, 2019. It includes a count sheet, an out-count form, an inmate roster, and multiple count slips, all related to the routine inmate population management and headcount procedures at the facility.

persons.name: Gama-Pineda
persons.context: Listed as an inmate on the official roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, with the register number 85918-054, assigned to a hospital or suicide watch category.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine official inmate population counts were conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, across multiple housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: The documents are dated August 4, 2019, which is the day Jeffrey Epstein was found deceased in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.
The forms show standard prison administrative procedures for tracking inmate population, including a count sheet, out-count form, roster, and count slips.
One inmate, Gama-Pineda (Reg # 85918-054), is specifically named on the roster and is categorized under 'HOSP' or 'SUICIDE OR UNASSG'.
The total inmate count recorded was 762, verified as 761, indicating a discrepancy of one inmate during this count period.
The documents are procedural and do not directly mention Jeffrey Epstein or the circumstances of his death, focusing instead on routine facility operations.
